definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[יָשַׁנְתִּי]] Job 3:13; [[וְיָֽשְׁנוּ]] consec. Je 51:39 + 2 t.; Impf. [[יִישָָׁן]] Is 5:27, Ps 121:4; [[וַיִישַׁן]] 1Ki 19:5, etc.; Inf. cstr. [[לִישׁוֹן]] Ec 5:11; —sleep, go to sleep, and be asleep, Ge 2:21 (J), Ge 41:5 (E), Ez Eze 34:25, Job 3:13, Ps 3:6, Ps 4:9, Pr 4:16, Ec 5:11, also 2Sa 4:6 LXX We Dr Kit Bu, vid. [[חׂמֶשׁ]]; c. [[לאׂ]], of Ass. army Is 5:27 (‖[[נוּם]]); of Baal 1Ki 19:5; of ´[[י]], [[עוּרָה לָמָּה חִישַׁן]] [[אֲדׂנׇי]] † Psalm Ps 44:24; [[לאׂ יִישָָׁן]] Ps 121:4 (‖[[נוּס]]); c. acc. cogn. [[שְׁנַת עוֹלָס]] ´[[ישׁ]] Je 51:39, Je 51:57 (v. [[שֵׁנׇה]]), of death, cf. [[אִישַׁן]] [[הַמָּוֶת]] Ps 13:4. Niph. only in deriv. sense of become inactive or stationary; Pf.  [[וְנוֹשַׁנְחֶס]] consec. De 4:25 and ye be grown old  [[בָּאָדֶץ]], i.e. (v. Di Dr) have lost freshness of first impressions; of inanimate things, be old, stale , only Pt. [[יׇשָׁן נוֹשָׁן]] Le 26:10 (H), f. [[חרעת נוֹשֶׁנֶת]] Le 13:11 = old leprosy  (P); these poss. denom. from [[יׇשָׁן]]
